channel.title: Plans on Giovanni Licameli
channel.description: Recent content in Plans on Giovanni Licameli

item.title: Hacking the Jobscape....I'm in.
item.description: Professional Career Space (I got a job) After many months of searching, applying, and interviews I got a professional offer from MasterCard and I accepted it. Currently I am a Linux Systems Engineer which is less security than I had preferred but no doubt is an excellent and relevant start to my next chapter in life. I get to be in a terminal where I am most comfortable, there still is security involved, and I get to talk to individuals who can only further advance my knowledge.

item.title: Learning Timeline
item.description: I’m done. No more school. What’s next? I did it. I graduated. Today at 12:03 PM, I finished my last final and it still hasn’t hit me yet. I have plenty of things still yet to do, but the most intense relief that did hit me was I never have to do an assignment that I do not want to without getting paid (homework). I don’t have school and currently my job working for the school is ending by the end of the week, so I’ll be out of work to.
